# Messenger App - Custom Copilot Instructions

This is a modern desktop messenger application built with:
- **Electron** - Desktop app framework
- **React** - UI framework
- **TypeScript** - Type-safe JavaScript
- **Styled Components** - CSS-in-JS styling
- **Socket.io** (planned) - Real-time communication

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Implement TypeScript interfaces for all data structures
- Follow modern React patterns (hooks, context, etc.)
- Use styled-components for all styling
- Maintain consistent naming conventions (PascalCase for components, camelCase for functions/variables)
- Include proper error handling and loading states

## Project Structure
- `electron/` - Electron main and renderer process files
- `src/` - React application source code
- `src/components/` - Reusable React components
- `public/` - Static assets and HTML template
- `dist/` - Built application files

## Key Features to Implement
- Real-time messaging with Socket.io
- User authentication
- Chat rooms and direct messages
- File sharing capabilities
- Responsive and modern UI design
- Electron-specific features (notifications, system tray)

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize user experience and performance
- Implement proper state management
- Add comprehensive error handling
- Include accessibility features
- Follow security best practices for Electron apps
